Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas

Class TestQuotaObserverChoreWithMiniCluster

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas.TestQuotaObserverChoreWithMiniCluster
public class TestQuotaObserverChoreWithMiniCluster extends Object
Test class for QuotaObserverChore that uses a live HBase cluster.
